mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_sub_t(b_no, bs_seq, bs_file, bs_size) VALUES(#{b_no}, #{bs_seq}, #{bs_file}, #{bs_size})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master_t BOARD_MASTER_NO_PK)*/ b_no FROM board_master_t WHERE rownum = 1),0)+1 b_group FROM dual
SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master_t i_bgroup)*/ b_group FROM board_master_t WHERE rownum = 1 AND b_group > 0),0)+1 b_group FROM dual

SELECT bm.b_no, bm.b_title, bm.b_writer, bs.bs_file, bm.b_hit ,bm.b_content, bm.b_date, bm.b_group, bm.b_pos, bm.b_step ,bm.b_pw, bs.bs_file, NVL(bs.bs_size,0) bs_size FROM board_master_t bm LEFT OUTER JOIN board_sub_t bs ON bm.b_no = bs.b_no
AND bm.b_date = #{b_date}
AND bm.b_no = #{b_no}
AND bm.b_title LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm.b_content LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm.b_writer LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
ORDER BY bm.b_group desc, b_step asc
